entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
